channel.title: Posts on The 1st Workshop on Human-Centered AI for SE
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The 1st Workshop on Human-Centered AI for SE

item.title: Website Launch Announcement
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that the HumanAISE Workshop website is now live! Explore our mission, ongoing projects, and upcoming events focused on advancing human-centered AI in software engineering.

item.title: Introduction to HumanAI4SE
item.description: Explore the intersection of AI and Software Engineering, focusing on human-centered approaches to enhance developer productivity and uphold ethical standards.

item.title: Introduction to the Organizing Committee
item.description: Meet the dedicated team leading the HumanAISE Workshop, committed to advancing human-centered AI in software engineering.

item.title: Current Progress in Human-Centered AI for Software Engineering
item.description: Explore the latest advancements in integrating human-centered artificial intelligence within software engineering, focusing on ethical considerations, collaborative tools, and emerging research.
